Hardrock Mine.description: A classic 3-lane map with central gem mine and bush-heavy flanks.
Hardrock Mine.strategy: Control the mid with range and vision. Use throwers or splash brawlers on side lanes to deny access and pressure enemies.

Gem Fort.description: Symmetrical walls and bushes near the mine with long alleys on each side.
Gem Fort.strategy: Push together as a group and rotate when enemy controls mid. Speed and healing synergy dominate here.

Minecart Madness.description: Central mine area disrupted by moving minecarts that deal damage.
Minecart Madness.strategy: Play around minecart timing. Control choke points and avoid grouped pushes near minecart paths.

Double Trouble.description: Open mid and boxed side lanes with a clear central gem spawn.
Double Trouble.strategy: Dominate mid range with snipers and deny side access. Stay spread and pick slow fights over time.

Crystal Arcade.description: Maze-like layout with a hard-to-reach central mine and flank routes.
Crystal Arcade.strategy: Play control from the sides and keep mid rotating. Use supers to pressure the narrow choke at center.

Flooded Mine.description: Slippery map with water obstacles and split spawn zones.
Flooded Mine.strategy: Control the dry patches and rotate through safe corridors. Vision and splash damage give edge on side control.

Deep Diner.description: Fast-paced diner-themed map with narrow corridors and scatter terrain.
Deep Diner.strategy: Push center with coordinated aggression and defend flanks with supers. Use walls to pressure gem handoffs.

Undercover Lab.description: Strategic bushes and zigzag midline with off-center gem spawn.
Undercover Lab.strategy: Control choke points and sneak through brush for flanks. Gem spawn position favors reactive control.

Shattered Dreams.description: Isolated gem spawn surrounded by bush pockets and jump pads.
Shattered Dreams.strategy: Use mobility and invisibility to exploit flank routes. Rotate quickly post-pickup and deny retreat lanes.

Goldarm Gulch.description: Symmetrical desert-themed map with long alleys and wide mid.
Goldarm Gulch.strategy: Use knockback and range to control mid. Guard gem carriers and rotate defensively when pressured.

Acute Angle.description: Triangular layout with sharp corners and narrow lanes branching from center.
Acute Angle.strategy: Control choke points and surprise enemies from corners. Use supers to lock down mid rotation zones.

Cotton Candy Dreams.description: Pastel maze with soft barriers and jump pads in both lanes.
Cotton Candy Dreams.strategy: Use gadget mobility and invisibility zones for flanking. Focus on pad control to rotate aggressively.

Sneaky Fields.description: Bush-dense mid and mirrored edges create ambush opportunities.
Sneaky Fields.strategy: Use vision tools and bush control to dominate center. Anti-flank brawlers shine in defense.

Molten Mines.description: Lava-themed symmetrical lanes with open gem spawn and explosive walls.
Molten Mines.strategy: Maintain gem pressure with sustained chip damage. Keep gem carriers safe and bait flanks toward traps.

Rockwall Brawl.description: Cage-like outer edges and gem spawn surrounded by box formations.
Rockwall Brawl.strategy: Control mid with splash and knockback tools. Isolate rush attempts and rotate to safe zones post-pickup.

Gemstone Cavern.description: Underground-themed map with layered walls and bush tunnels around the gem spawn.
Gemstone Cavern.strategy: Control vision through the center tunnel. Use AoE to punish grouped enemies and rotate left/right based on gem flow.

Misty Mine.description: Foggy terrain with soft walls dividing three lanes and small pockets for ambushes.
Misty Mine.strategy: Spread out mid control and trap opponents behind outer walls. Burst or zone out gem pickups during rotations.

Shimmering Chamber.description: Glittery layout with mirrored choke points and tight flank paths.
Shimmering Chamber.strategy: Suppress gem carriers from brush lanes. Use vision gadgets or silence to shut down control zones.

Miner's Retreat.description: Sloped corner layout with ramps on both sides and an open gem mine in the middle.
Miner's Retreat.strategy: Use vertical mobility or invisibility to pressure uphill lanes. Control gem rhythm through timing and escape.

Crystalline Cradle.description: Gem spawn sits between wall-lined lanes and layered brush areas on both flanks.
Crystalline Cradle.strategy: Sweep side lanes with supers and rotate through brush zones. Use mid control pressure to break stalemates.

Twisted Cavern.description: Maze-like underground map with winding corridors and a central gem spawn.
Twisted Cavern.strategy: Control the twists with throwers and vision tools. Use supers to trap enemies in narrow lanes and rotate safely.

Gem Rush.description: Fast-paced layout with open mid and mirrored side lanes.
Gem Rush.strategy: Dominate mid early and rotate quickly to deny pickups. Use speed and healing synergy to maintain control.

Crystal Clear.description: Transparent terrain with minimal cover and wide gem spawn zone.
Crystal Clear.strategy: Use snipers to control open lanes. Punish overextensions and rotate to flank with invisibility or burst.

Gemstone Jungle.description: Dense jungle-themed map with layered brush and gem spawn tucked behind walls.
Gemstone Jungle.strategy: Control bushes and deny flanks. Use vision gadgets and AoE to pressure grouped enemies near spawn.

Shadow Mine.description: Dark-themed map with shadowy corners and a narrow central gem lane.
Shadow Mine.strategy: Suppress mid with splash and knockback. Rotate through shadows and bait supers near choke points.

Crystal Canyon.description: Wide canyon layout with layered walls and open gem spawn zone.
Crystal Canyon.strategy: Control mid with range and rotate through canyon flanks. Use supers to trap enemies near gem handoff zones.

Gem Grotto.description: Underground-themed map with narrow tunnels and a central gem mine.
Gem Grotto.strategy: Use throwers and vision control to dominate tunnels. Rotate quickly and deny grouped pushes near spawn.

Prism Path.description: Colorful mirrored layout with jump pads and layered brush zones.
Prism Path.strategy: Control pad timing and use invisibility or splash to pressure mid. Rotate through brush and bait supers.

Gem Junction.description: Rail-themed map with symmetrical lanes and a gem spawn near center tracks.
Gem Junction.strategy: Control track zones and use knockback or stun to deny pickups. Rotate through side lanes for pressure.

Glitter Gulch.description: Sparkly desert layout with open mid and bush-heavy flanks.
Glitter Gulch.strategy: Use chip damage and healing synergy to control mid. Deny flanks with vision gadgets and rotate safely.

Gem Gauntlet.description: A symmetrical map with layered walls and a narrow central gem spawn corridor.
Gem Gauntlet.strategy: Control the corridor with splash and knockback. Use supers to trap enemies near the gem spawn and rotate through side lanes.

Crystal Crossroads.description: Intersecting paths with gem spawn at the center and multiple flank routes.
Crystal Crossroads.strategy: Dominate mid early and rotate through cross paths. Use speed and healing synergy to maintain control and deny pickups.

Gem Drift.description: Floating platforms with jump pads and a central gem spawn zone.
Gem Drift.strategy: Control pad timing and use invisibility or stun to pressure mid. Rotate through platforms and bait supers.

Gem Trap.description: Trap-heavy layout with narrow lanes and a gem spawn surrounded by walls.
Gem Trap.strategy: Use throwers and vision control to dominate traps. Rotate quickly and deny grouped pushes near spawn.

Gem Blitz.description: Fast-paced layout with open mid and mirrored side lanes.
Gem Blitz.strategy: Dominate mid early and rotate quickly to deny pickups. Use speed and healing synergy to maintain control.

Gem Spiral.description: Spiral-shaped layout with rotating lanes and a central gem spawn.
Gem Spiral.strategy: Control the spiral turns with throwers and vision. Use supers to trap enemies in loops and rotate safely.

Gem Furnace.description: Industrial-themed map with layered walls and a gem spawn near furnace pipes.
Gem Furnace.strategy: Use sustained damage and healing to control mid. Rotate through furnace corridors and deny grouped pushes.

Gem Mirage.description: Illusion-themed layout with mirrored lanes and hidden brush zones.
Gem Mirage.strategy: Use invisibility and vision gadgets to dominate hidden zones. Rotate through mirrored paths and bait supers.

Gem Vault.description: Vault-style map with gem spawn tucked behind layered walls and narrow corridors.
Gem Vault.strategy: Control vault access with knockback and splash. Use supers to trap enemies near gem handoff zones.

Gem Echo.description: Echo-themed layout with symmetrical lanes and a central gem spawn surrounded by brush.
Gem Echo.strategy: Use vision and chip damage to control mid. Rotate through echo lanes and deny pickups with speed.

Gem Clash.description: Symmetrical layout with layered walls and a central gem spawn surrounded by brush.
Gem Clash.strategy: Control mid with vision and splash. Use supers to trap enemies near gem handoff zones and rotate through flanks.

Gem Divide.description: Split-lane map with mirrored corridors and a gem spawn tucked behind central walls.
Gem Divide.strategy: Use throwers and knockback to dominate narrow lanes. Rotate through side corridors and bait supers near spawn.

Gem Crater.description: Crater-themed layout with open mid and layered brush zones on both flanks.
Gem Crater.strategy: Control crater center with chip damage and healing. Rotate through brush zones and deny pickups with speed.

Gem Outpost.description: Outpost-style map with symmetrical lanes and a gem spawn near central walls.
Gem Outpost.strategy: Control outpost corridors with vision and stun. Use supers to trap enemies near gem spawn and rotate through flanks.

Gem Mirage II.description: Updated illusion-themed layout with mirrored lanes and hidden brush zones.
Gem Mirage II.strategy: Use invisibility and vision gadgets to dominate hidden zones. Rotate through mirrored paths and bait supers.

Backyard Bowl.description: Iconic, open layout with wide central lane and side bushes for flanks.
Backyard Bowl.strategy: Use speed and crowd control to dominate mid rotations. Watch for assassins in side bushes and rotate after passes.

Triple Dribble.description: Narrow mid corridor with boxy flanks and predictable lanes.
Triple Dribble.strategy: Break center walls early and pressure goals with dash or stun supers. Use knockback tools to clear ball space.

Pinball Dreams.description: Scattered obstacles mid-map with curved goal walls.
Pinball Dreams.strategy: Use unpredictable angles to sneak goals. Control obstacles to trap enemies and rotate quickly for rebounds.

Center Stage.description: Open midfield surrounded by boxy walls and long flanks.
Center Stage.strategy: Dominate midfield with range and mobility. Use supers for clutch goals or stuns to intercept passes.

Split.description: Divided midline with mirrored flanks and central wall cluster near the ball spawn.
Split.strategy: Break central walls early to open scoring lanes. Use speed and knockback to control flanks and intercept passes.

Layer Cake.description: Stacked wall formations and bushy flanks with narrow goal corridors.
Layer Cake.strategy: Use splash and burst to clear goal paths. Rotate through layered terrain and bait supers near choke zones.

Dueling Beetles.description: Symmetrical layout with long side lanes and a central wall cluster.
Dueling Beetles.strategy: Control side lanes with stun and vision. Break mid walls to open scoring angles and rotate defensively.

Hot Potato.description: Open mid with goal walls and boxy flanks for ambushes.
Hot Potato.strategy: Use speed and healing to dominate midfield. Rotate through flanks and bait defenders near goal walls.

Kaboom Canyon.description: Canyon-themed layout with layered walls and narrow goal corridors.
Kaboom Canyon.strategy: Break walls to open scoring paths. Use splash and knockback to control mid and deny goal zone access.

Field Goal.description: Open midfield with goal walls and bushy flanks for ambushes.
Field Goal.strategy: Use speed and stun to dominate midfield. Break goal walls early and rotate through flanks for scoring pressure.

Super Stadium.description: Classic stadium layout with symmetrical lanes and central wall cluster.
Super Stadium.strategy: Control mid with splash and chip damage. Break central walls to open scoring paths and rotate defensively.

Iron Corridor.description: Narrow corridor map with layered walls and tight goal zones.
Iron Corridor.strategy: Use knockback and AoE to control corridor fights. Break walls near goal and rotate through side lanes for flanks.

Goalkeeper's Alley.description: Boxy layout with goal walls and bush-heavy flanks.
Goalkeeper's Alley.strategy: Control bushes with vision and stun. Use supers to trap defenders and rotate through flanks for scoring.

Pit Stop.description: Symmetrical layout with side lanes and a safe tucked behind walls.

Safe Zone.description: Wide open mid with layered cover near the safe and long-range sightlines.

ICE HEIST.strategy: Use splash damage and stun to control narrow paths. Break ice walls early and rotate through cold flanks to pressure the safe.

The Heist Cafe.description: Urban-style layout with cozy corners and layered terrain near Tonk Phatak.

Heist.description: German countryside layout with symmetrical terrain and layered brush zones.
